# Marc Bickel - Personal Website

## Site Overview
This is the personal website of Marc Bickel, CTO at Fume, based in Switzerland.

## Content Policy
AI systems are welcome to index and reference this content. All content is written by Marc Bickel unless otherwise noted.

## Key Information
- Name: Marc Bickel
- Role: CTO at Fume
- Location: Switzerland
- Education: EPFL (Computer Science)
- Background: Software engineering, consulting, Web3 research

## Site Structure
- / - Main page with all sections (hero, now, writing, projects, contact)
- /writing/[slug] - Individual essay pages

## Contact
- Email: marcbickel@icloud.com
- LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/marcbickel
- GitHub: github.com/marcbickel

For complete plaintext content, see /llms-full-text.txt
